message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something reasonable. This is a long-term game, let's be fair to each other.
You wanted fair, I'll give you a bit less than last time, but still more than you offered me
It seems like we're getting closer. This is a slight adjustment to encourage a deal - time is running out for both of us!
Getting closer indeed, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Alice, let's be realistic. We both lose if we don't agree soon. This is a strong offer considering the time pressure and inflation working against me.
You're right about the time pressure, but I still think I have the upper hand here
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.  Take it or leave it, but we both lose if this goes any further.
